There was one other sighting in Fort Worth on or around January 30th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was outside playing with my toddler son at when i saw approximately 6-10 spheres flying in what looked like a formation floating from north to south. at first, i thought that they were just released helium balloons. on further observation, however, they seemed too big and their placement in relation to each other did not seem random enough. they moved very slowly and at a certain point (probably around 8 minutes into the episode) one of the spheres on the flank appeared to circle another that was adjacent to it. after this, they started to slowly disappear except for one which got brighter and started to reverse its path from heading south back to heading north. it appeared to be rising and it too faded from sight. i live in white settlement, tx, just about 2 miles from a naval reserve\texas air national guard base (fort worth nas\jrb). no aircraft were ever scrambled. it was 5:30 in the afternoon, clear sky, still daylight. the spheres did float like balloons and they did move in the direction of the wind......but their behavior just seemed odd.
